front.title: •Slight Weapons Malfunction (V)
front.gametext: Take a Rebel stormtrooper into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel a weapon destiny targeting a stormtrooper (or Chewie). OR If a stormtrooper just fired a weapon (except a lightsaber) during battle, add one battle destiny.
front.lore: Han was gifted in the art of understatement.

rulings: The 'stormtrooper' could belong to either player.
